name: Avoid the Triangles
description:
Playing on mobile is recommended!

Avoid the Triangles is a fast paced casual game about not dying.

There are four modes - Classic, Brutal, Zen and 2 Player. In Classic, just tap the screen to jump, and avoid the triangles. Brutal takes it up a notch, starting you at the highest difficulty. Zen lets you practise without dying. 2 Player is exactly what it sounds like - just outlast your opponents.
